resources.string: There\'s no item in your place list.
There\'s no item in your stuff list.\nUse MENU to add stuff first!
You can LONG click any item in the list for more options.
LONG click picture frame to select any picture can represent your STUFF.
LONG click picture frame to select any picture can represent the PLACE you store stuff.
There\'s no place in your list right now!\nTry to add place from MENU.
Select Place Or Add from MENU
From MENU you can add new place then choose it from list above.
There\'s no stuff in your possess right now!\nTry to add some stuff from MENU.
RED means less than 3 days, BLUE means normal, GREY means already expired.
"There\'s NO PLACE to store stuff right now! \nBefore creating a stuff, You HAVE to add a place to store that stuff. \nChoose \"Add PLACE\", or \"Cancel\" to dismiss this message.
Delete the place will also delete those stuff stored inside it. You can see what\'s inside first to determine if deleting it anyway.
From MENU you can share this stuff on Facebook!

1. This is a Personal Mgmt application, aims to remind you of the validity of items and locations, so that things will not be wasted because of forgetfulness.

 2. You need to add items, and specify the location (for example: home refrigerators, storage rooms, etc.) and expiration date.

 3. In Stuff List, the day left colors are shown as followed: 
RED means less than 3 days, BLUE means normal, GREY means already expired.

 4. From stuff list you can preview all stuff you create, browsing name, description, picture and expiration status. At the bottom info bar, it shows current stuff amount.

 5. Items for the LBS function is only provided in full version, you can view other user's shared items.

 6. Any advice please mail to: robertwang.tw@gmail.com
Stuff name value can\'t be duplicate!
Place name value can\'t be duplicate!
